imdb.plot outline: Playboy airline pilot and former Marine, Capt. Tony Martin's life enters a tailspin after suffering a debilitating back injury. Battered by both pain and the effects of prescription drugs, Tony becomes a "castaway on the couch." Addicted to home shopping, videos and paint ball, the psychotic pilot is abandoned by his gold-digger girlfriend, ripped off by his unscrupulous financial advisor and henpecked by his overbearing mother, Tootsie. If this isn't bad enough he's divorced and estranged from both his ex and step-son. Captain Martin faces a choice, succumb to the dark side of his injury, or pull himself up by his boot-straps and fly right. His guardian angels will come on unlikely wings.
imdb.title: Out of Alignment
plot: Playboy airline pilot and former Marine, Capt. Tony Martin's life enters a tailspin after suffering a debilitating back injury. Addicted to home shopping, videos and paint ball, the psychotic pilot is abandoned by his gold-digger girlfriend, ripped off by his unscrupulous financial advisor and henpecked by his overbearing mother, Tootsie. If this isn't bad enough he's divorced and estranged from both his ex and step-son. Captain Martin faces a choice, succumb to the dark side of his injury, or pull himself up by his boot-straps and fly right. His guardian angels will come on unlikely wings.::Joseph Conforti
